name: 2nd International Conference on Management and Business
content: The ICMBCONF is a leading international conference on Management and Business, designed to bring together top experts to discuss the latest trends, cutting-edge strategies, and emerging challenges in todayâ€™s business landscape. Hosted in the dynamic city of London, known for its historical significance and innovation, this event provides a valuable platform for business professionals, academics, and industry leaders to exchange ideas, engage in insightful discussions, and connect with peers from around the world. Dates: July 18-20, 2025 Location: London, UK Venue: University of London Conference Highlights Collaborate with Global Leaders: Network with influential professionals, academics, policymakers, and industry leaders from across the globe as you explore groundbreaking trends, strategies, and technologies shaping the future of management and business. Participate in Dynamic Sessions: Be part of interactive discussions that tackle key challenges and opportunities in the business world. These sessions aim to inspire collaboration and innovative solutions. Boost Your Professional Standing: Submit your research for publication in the Conference Proceedings, which include an ISBN and DOI, and explore further publication opportunities in respected peer-reviewed journals and monographs. Explore London: Take part in a one-day guided tour of London, a city renowned for its rich heritage and lively culture. Discover its iconic landmarks while networking with fellow attendees in an unforgettable setting.
